channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Takaichi wins supermajority in snap election: Has Japan sent a message to China?
Cybersecurity, security liaison officers… What came out of Ajit Doval’s visit to Canada
Sanae Takaichi: Japan's first triumphant woman PM
FirstUp: Bangladesh-US trade deal and other big news of the day
Burnt out at work? This bar in Japan offers free career advice
Word of the Week is Anthropic. The AI firm in San Francisco that caused a ‘SaaSapocalypse’
How PM Modi’s Malaysia visit levels up ties, expands cooperation across sectors
item.description: As Southeast Asia becomes increasingly contested by the superpowers, the regional majors are looking for collaboration with a benign power, as well as significant business and security opportunities

item.title: India-US trade deal: A strategic win or a tough choice?
item.description: The true measure of success for India’s latest trade manoeuvres will lie in execution. If India leverages improved market access to accelerate its manufacturing, broaden its export portfolio, and attract investment into high-tech industries, it could pave the way for long-term economic resilience

item.title: Beyond ‘Ikkis’: Arun Khetarpal and Hanut Singh’s heroics in the 1971 war
item.description: From the battlefield of Basantar to the pages of history, saint-soldier Lt Gen Hanut Singh and young champ Second Lt Arun Khetarpal embodied courage, strategy, and sacrifice that transcended their era

item.title: How Islamabad Shia mosque bombing fits Pakistan’s history of manufactured crises
item.description: Several incidents illustrate an alleged pattern: the army uses violence as a tool to manipulate narratives, secure budgets, and maintain control, often at the expense of its citizens, to project itself as a necessary evil to fend off against India

item.title: Deal or no deal, India should remain cautious of Trump
item.description: India should never allow Donald Trump the illusion that he is in the driver’s seat

item.title: Beyond Trumpian tariffs: Trade deal fortifies India-US ties, boosts global supply goals
item.description: Beyond tariff cuts, the Trump-Modi understanding reflects India’s calibrated alignment with the West and its ambition to anchor global supply chains without surrendering strategic autonomy
